citation.case_name: Salvatore Territo, Charles Territo and Vincent Territo, a Partnership, Trading as Territo & Sons v. United States of America and Interstate Commerce Commission

html:
358 U.S. 279

79 S.Ct. 312

3 L.Ed.2d 298

Salvatore TERRITO, Charles Territo and Vincent Territo, a Partnership, Trading as Territo & Sons, et al., appellants,
v.
UNITED STATES of America and Interstate Commerce Commission.

No. 454.

Supreme Court of the United States

January 12, 1959

Motion to Reinstate Denied April 20, 1959.

1

See 359 U.S. 963, 79 S.Ct. 875.

2

Mr. Francis J. Ortman, for appellants.

3

Solicitor General Rankin, Assistant Attorney General Hansen, Messrs. Robert W. Ginnane and James A. Murray, for the United States and Interstate Commerce Commission.

4

The appeal is dismissed for the reason that the notice thereof was not filed within the time provided by law. Order per curiam.
